snippet.title: Polygon Hell | Official Trailer 1 (2K) | Coming August 5th 2024
snippet.description:
Time to lock and load, because the robots are at war with nature and they need your help to destroy biological life once and for all. Gear up today and show the world that you can make the tide turn!

Featuring:
- 9 realms to conquer
- A level cap of 64
- Multiplayer so you can play with your friends, enemies, (or both), and let them know who's the boss
- Non-Euclidean mazes
- An emotional questline with choices (who will you betray?)
- Spiders, mosquitos, rats, sheep, and other wildlife who will not go easy on you
- A diverse combat system featuring bombs, shovels, magnets, and guns.
- Instant download (less than 1MB)

Do you have what it takes?

Play/Wishlist it here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2765940/Polygon_Hell/
Join the Discord Community: https://discord.gg/Um9jgER8E5
